mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Anisansel, Henry to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Anisansel, Henry
mdRecord.dcterms:description: His Excy Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Nov 19 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 19 1861. A man of the name of B. P. Snyne is here prisoner of his own accord and wishes to go to Pennsylvania where he is from shall I let him go or send him to Wheeling under guard Henry Anisansel Col 1st VC 37D116pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Anisansel, Henry
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
